embed.title: Operation Exiles
embed.description: Our Conan server offers a casual PvE experience on the Exiled Lands map with 2x harvest rate and a few quality-of-life mods. The server is hosted in East US but is also suitable for players in the EU!

fields.name: Connection Info:
fields.value:
•   Server Name: Operation Exiles - PvE - 2x - Casual RP - Modded 
  •   Server IP: 192.154.228.127:7905

fields.name: Admins:
fields.value: Our __admins are available on the Discord__ to help with any important issues, however, we trust the community to be as __mature and patient as possible__ when the admins are not available in-game. __Please respect this__. Do not call admins for silly issues and respect that they may be busy, so please do not demand things or complain if they cannot be there right away.

fields.name: Rules:
fields.value:
•   NO displaying inappropriate or discriminatory language, usernames or pictures!
 •   NO stealing other people’s belongings! (Even in a public place)
 •   NO blocking passageways or entrances to important areas within the Exiled Lands! (or block important NPC spawns)
 •   You must ask permission before building directly beside another player!
•   NO more than 2 separate builds! (without permission)
 •   NO exploitation, cheating or hacking!
 •   MASSIVE builds the size of an entire city are prohibited unless you get permission from an admin!
 •   Thralls and Thespians should not be left in AI towns like Sepermeru!
 •   Obey the guild rules and city laws which are displayed in-game!
 •   All player trades must be completed with the agreed upon terms for all parties!

fields.name: Vote For Our Server:
fields.value: Every 24-hours you can vote for our server [here](https://conan-exiles.com/server/89716/)!
